entry.title: you care (but do you love me?)
entry.summary:
Author: maarbley

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,959Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 4

Summary: “I started you a warm bath it should help with the cramping a bit” Eddie says and Buck nods. “Thanks” he murmurs, his traitorous heart speeding up at how easily Eddie slides into the role of a caretaker. Buck started to notice it more lately. His knee brace and painkillers would be placed on the bench at the station after a long shift that made his injury flare up. His favorite conditioner and curl mouse would be restocked before he even noticed they were running low. When his brain got too loud there would be headphones slid onto his ears with a podcast he was always forgetting to finish. When his limbs felt like lead there would be an offer to drive him home even though Eddie hates driving in LA, especially when their shift just ends and it’s still half dark. The action’s feel a lot like love, but he is not ready to unpack that yet.Or, Eddie and Buck get stranded at Nashville because of the storm. Feelings happen.

entry.title: as usual i'm almost on time and you're the last thing on my mind
entry.summary:
Author: Error404_410 (NotImportant1598)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 47,408Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: They stayed there for a couple of beats, the tension rising while the warmth in Eddie’s stomach grew. He blew out a breath, trying to think past the fuzziness in his brain before he finally looked up to meet Buck’s eyes. He stared back at Eddie with the picture perfect face of innocence, but his eyes, his pupils swallowing up his irises told a different story. Eddie leaned back against his seat, his head lolling lazily to the side as he watched Buck, letting the silence persist while his hand stayed over Buck’s, his chest was rising and falling heavier than it had a minute ago, his mouth felt dry and his thighs kept flexing, holding onto their little stand off by a thread of dignity he still had. “Thank you.” He whispered, “For today. For having my back. Thank you.”   Or: Buck was training to be the next captain of the 118, becoming Eddie's superior, older than him by 16 years, that doesn't stop Eddie from lusting after the man, and it sure as hell doesn't keep Buck away from him in return.

entry.title: Hazel Brown and Royal Blue
entry.summary:
Author: PenInBlues

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,525Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 4

Summary: In a world where politics and royalty collide, Evan “Buck” Buckley is the Second Prince of England—the spare with just enough responsibility to behave and just enough freedom to be dangerous. Charismatic, reckless, and hiding more than the tabloids will ever know, Buck lives his life like the crown is a game he never asked to play. Across the ocean, Edmundo “Eddie” Diaz has spent his entire life following orders—first as a soldier like his father, and now as the First Son of the United States after his mother’s unexpected rise to the presidency. Returning from the army with a son to protect, Eddie is determined to build a controlled, quiet life far away from chaos. That plan shatters the moment Eddie sees the Second Prince of England again—blue-eyed, infuriating, and impossible to ignore. They must decide whether protecting their worlds is worth losing each other—or if love itself is the biggest risk they’ll ever take.

entry.title: Second Chances
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 630,341Chapters: 67/?Kudos: 86

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children who’ve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

entry.title: Evergrowing
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 413,888Chapters: 60/?Kudos: 25

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn’t end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they’re reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: The Price of Power
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 256,760Chapters: 43/?Kudos: 23

Summary: Athena Carter and Bobby Nash couldn’t be more different. She’s the disciplined “good girl” with her future mapped out, while he’s the dangerous bad boy with one foot in college and the other in the streets. When their worlds start to collide, what begins as a bitter rivalry quickly sparks into something deeper neither of them can ignore. But falling for Bobby means stepping into a world Athena never imagined, one ruled by loyalty and violence. That tested everything she thought she knew about herself. As sparks turn to fire, Athena must decide if love is worth the risk of losing everything.

entry.title: Interlude on I-10
entry.summary:
Author: Bookworm0303

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 69,191Chapters: 12/15Kudos: 1,668

Summary: Without waiting for a reaction or reply, the man bore down on the gas and peeled down the highway, leaving Buck stranded in the middle of nowhere somewhere along Interstate 10. And as Buck watched the red brake lights of his Jeep disappear into the distance, clutching his prescription of blood thinners tightly to his chest... there was really only one thing left to do. Tilting his head back until he was staring at the stars, he took a deep breath and screamed into the night: “Fuck!” And much like every other one of his recent cries for help, it had gone unanswered. --- Buck gets carjacked, held at gunpoint, and stranded in Arizona the day before his first shift post-lawsuit. And that's only the beginning of his troubles.

entry.title: A Drop In The Ocean, A Change In The Weather...
entry.summary:
Author: InterrogateTheCat

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,603Chapters: 15/20Kudos: 148

Summary: Buck and Eddie are secretly together.Buck and Chris get caught in the tsunami.Buck saves Chris, but doesn't save herself, and is taken out to sea.Stuck on an island alone, pregnant she has to try to survive for her and her baby.Eddie has to mourn his only love.No major death, presumed dead.Alternating POV Or, "The water," Christopher cried, his voice pitching up into hysteria. "She fell off the ambulance! I tried to grab her, Dad, I tried! But she yelled at me to stay! She yelled at me and then the water took her!" Eddie stared at his son. He felt like he had been hollowed out with a spoon. The water took her. "Did she... did you see her get up?" Eddie asked, gripping the chair arm a little too tight. "Did she swim to to safety?" "No," Christopher wailed. "She didn't come back to me! She didn't come back! I couldn't see her." No. No, absolutely not. She is Evi Buckley. She survived a ladder truck bombing. She survived a tracheotomy. She survived a pulmonary embolism. She does not die in a wave. "Dad?" Christopher was looking at him, terrified. "Is Bucky dead?"

entry.title: All the Pieces
entry.summary:
Author: Ctwngrl07

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,024Chapters: 8/8Kudos: 11

Summary: Eddie has spent his life performing—husband, father, firefighter, friend. But one look, one touch, one moment, and everything shifts. As he navigates the disorienting rush of desire, fear, and long-hidden truths, Buck realizes he’s in love with his best friend. A series of small moments, unspoken tensions, and a life-threatening accident forces them both to confront what they've been avoiding all along.   Or: Eddie thought he knew who he was. Buck thought he knew his place. Then everything they thought they understood about friendship, love, and family exploded in the firehouse—and suddenly, they were both trying not to burn.

entry.title: Golden Lines (Please Keep Breathing)
entry.summary:
Author: Buki_stories21

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 59,005Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 102

Summary: Eddie's past comes for him with consequences. He and Buck are taken, dragged back into a violence Eddie thought he’d buried. Buck is broken piece by piece, and Eddie is left, forced to listen to the sounds of the second most important person in his world being torn apart, unable to scream, unable to save him. They live.But survival is not mercy.

entry.title: The Answer To Every 'What If'
entry.summary:
Author: cadburystories

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 55,491Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 30

Summary: After Bobby's death, Evan Buckley falls into a spiral of guilt, grief and despair. Coming back to LA for the funerals, Eddie sees Buck's pain and tries deal with it but it doesn't go quite as planned... Out of concern for his best friend, but also because he misses home, Eddie decides to move back to LA and stay with Buck until he is better. How will that go for them? Will feelings finally surface? Is there going to be a realization on one or both parties?

entry.title: he ain't my blood (but he's my boy)
entry.summary:
Author: alwaysou28

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,952Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 153

Summary: By the time Chris made it to the kitchen table, the food was steaming on a plate, a fork already stuck in for him. “You gonna tell me it was stupid?” Chris mumbled. “What? Stealing alcohol and watering it down, thinking we wouldn’t notice?” Buck suggested. “Yeah, it was. Your dad’s been drinking the same brand of tequila for over a decade.” “I meant…the drinking,” Chris shoved a huge mouthful of egg in his mouth. “It kind of seems like you already know,” Buck shrugged. OR Chris drinks. Buck is the one that figures it out.
